Name: Endless Fireworks Simulator
About the game: This is a small and well-designed firework simulator. All you have to do is open the game and watch it quietly. - Endless fireworks, adding many colors to your life. - Carefully simulated sound effects, explosion sounds are clear and pleasant. - The fireworks effect can be adjusted arbitrarily, and the fireworks shape can be customized. In any festival that needs fireworks, or any time that needs to be in a daze to watch fireworks, I will be your faithful friend.
